sourcesContent:
import { Modal, Box } from '@mui/material' import { BookModalContainer, BookModalContent, BookHeader, BookTitleContainer, BookDescriptionContainer, BookDetails } from './BookModal.style'; const style = { position: 'absolute', top: '50%', left: '50%', transform: 'translate(-50%, -50%)', width: 600, bgcolor: 'background.paper', border: '1px solid #fff', boxShadow: 24, p: 4, }; export function BookModal({book, onClose, isOpen}){ const publicationDate = new Date(book?.publicationDate)?.toLocaleDateString('he') ?? ''; return( {book?.title} {book?.description} <>
Author: {book?.author}
Genre: {book?.genre}
Publication Date: {publicationDate}
Price: {book?.price}$
 ) }
